nodes.text: A green-bladed lightsaber belonged to Voe, a Force-sensitive female human who joined the Jedi Order under the tutelage of Jedi Master Luke Skywalker.

In 28 ABY, Ben Solo destroyed the Jedi Temple of Luke Skywalker. Alongside fellow Padawans Tai and Hennix, she confronted him with her lightsaber, but he fled without providing answers. They pursued him to an outpost on Elphrona and dueled on a cliff. When Solo attempted to kill Voe with a Force push, her lightsaber was knocked out of her hand and broke in half on the rocks below.
